column3: str

<Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>! While I am certain that your duties with <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))>the Maelstrom<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))>the Order of the Twin Adder<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))>the Immortal Flames<Else/></If> demand much of your time already, I wondered if I might have a word?

I shall get right to the point, <Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/>. The higher-ups have authorized plans to form a specialized squad and we are on the lookout for a reliable leader. Your name was at the top of the list.

You would be responsible for training and commanding a number of adventurer subordinates, and the position also comes with the possibility of further promotion. What say you, <Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/>? Are you ready to lead?
（★未使用／削除予定★）
（★未使用／削除予定★）
Become a squadron commander?
Yes
No
Ah. Well, 'tis hardly the response I was hoping for, but 'tis best we are all honest here. A hesitant commander is a danger to <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> own troops.
Excellent! Let's get you acquainted with your second-in-command immediately.

It's an honor to be serving with you, <Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>! In my capacity as your aide, I'll be filling the role of squadron sergeant.
And these eager troopers are the inaugural members of our squadron. Form up!
Every one of them is a fledgling adventurer who enlisted in the hopes of following in your legendary footsteps. They're green to the military, aye, but we'll harden them up soon enough.
When you've a moment to spare, stop by the barracks and we can discuss their training and deployment in greater detail.
I'll leave you to it, then, Commander.
What do you think? I must admit they're raw as soldiers go, but they certainly have potential. I look forward to seeing what you can do with them.

Very well, I shan't keep you any longer. Your squadron's barracks can be found through the door at the back of the <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))>command room<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))>Adders' Nest<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))>Hall of Flames<Else/></If>.

May <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))>the Navigator guide you to victory<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))>the Matron watch over you<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))>Nald'thal bless you with fortune<Else/></If>!

You are now the commander of an adventurer squadron!
Enter the <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))>Maelstrom<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))>Twin Adder<Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))>Flame<Else/></If> Barracks and speak with your squadron sergeant to issue deployment orders.
